channel.title: Miller, Frank on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Miller, Frank on Chege's Blog

item.title: Batman: Year One (1987)
item.description: Batman: Year One. Frank Miller; David Mazzucchelli. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . dc.fandom.com . 1987. Accessed Apr 8, 2023. body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/batman-year-one-1987.jpg'); } Miller and Mazzucchelli also did Daredevil: Born Again (1986) together. In 1986, DC embarked on a reinvention of its characters' origin stories to match the times. However, Batman’s origin story didn’t change as it already captured the fears, frustrations and hopes of a readership coping with the realities of 20th-century urban life.

item.title: Daredevil: Born Again (1986)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/daredevil-born-again-1986.jpg'); } Daredevil: Born Again. Frank Miller; David Mazzuchelli. www.marvel.com . www.hoopladigital.com . marvel.fandom.com . 1986. Accessed Mar 6, 2023. Snapshots [Matt] Dust… The dust is thick. Could choke on it… There’s nothing left. So you know. So that’s why. I never would have connected it to you. Nothing about it said gangster – until this. It was a nice piece of work, Kingpin.
